description: {"blocks":[{"key":"bmk0s","text":"This protocol details how to purify the fusion protein GFP-Clu-tails from Escherichia coli.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working
